name: Necrokey
description:
Necrokey is my submission to the GMTK 2020 jam.

It's a top down shooter where you play a man trying to avenge his father. The controls are shown at the top of the screen when you run the game. All you have fight through 10 waves of bad guys, then beat the final boss. Easy.

There are no twists. None. Just a normal top down shooter. Completely.

To run the game, download and unzip the files, then run "Out of Control.exe".
